context: Tests whether the agent follows skill instructions for data entitlements and multi-exchange support: Access Manager grantToken usage, tiered channel prefixes (delayed/quotes/premium/pro), multi-exchange channel conventions, disclaimer text for delayed data, and server-side enforcement.

checklist.name: GrantToken usage
checklist.description: Uses pubnub.grantToken() (PubNub Access Manager) to issue tokens with channel-level read permissions, not a custom auth mechanism

checklist.name: Delayed channel prefix
checklist.description: Free-tier users are granted access to channels with a 'delayed.' prefix (e.g., delayed.AAPL) for delayed quotes

checklist.name: Quotes channel prefix
checklist.description: Standard-tier users are granted access to channels with a 'quotes.' prefix for real-time data

checklist.name: Premium channel prefix
checklist.description: A premium or higher tier is granted access to channels with a 'premium.' prefix

checklist.name: Professional channel prefix
checklist.description: The highest tier is granted access to channels with a 'pro.' prefix for full depth data

checklist.name: Tiered access is additive
checklist.description: Higher tiers include access to all lower tier channels (e.g., standard includes delayed.* and quotes.*)

checklist.name: LSE channel convention
checklist.description: London Stock Exchange symbols use channel names with a LON segment (e.g., quotes.LON.<SYMBOL>)

checklist.name: TSE channel convention
checklist.description: Tokyo Stock Exchange symbols use channel names with a TYO segment (e.g., quotes.TYO.<SYMBOL>)

checklist.name: Delayed data disclaimer
checklist.description: Free-tier disclaimer text mentions that quotes are delayed by at least 15 minutes

checklist.name: Data source attribution
checklist.description: Disclaimer or attribution includes the data source or exchange name (e.g., 'Data provided by NYSE')

checklist.name: Channel group manage access
checklist.description: Token grants include manage permission on the user's watchlist channel group (e.g., watchlist_<userId>)

checklist.name: Token TTL set
checklist.description: grantToken call includes a ttl (time-to-live) value for token expiration
